doc.name: Translate2D
doc.description: This actor represents a translation of a two-dimensional GR scene.
doc.author: Steve Neuendorffer
doc.port: The amount of translation in the x-axis during firing. If this transform is in accumulate mode, the translation value is accumulated for each firing.
The amount of translation in the y-axis during firing. If this transform is in accumulate mode, the translation value is accumulated for each firing.
doc.property: The initial translation in the x-axis This parameter should contain a DoubleToken. The default value of this parameter is 0.0.
The initial translation in the y-axis This parameter should contain a DoubleToken. The default value of this parameter is 0.0.
